name: maya hoque
comment: The HP Chromebook 11a is a bargain Chromebook with appeal for casual internet surfers and money-strapped students, but its uncomfortable touchpad makes browsing a chore

name: arya sultana
comment: HP's new Victus 16 is a good budget gaming laptop, but it commits the sin that the best in its class avoidâ€”its cost-cutting design pokes through in several key ways.

name: yaalan singh
comment: HP's ZBook Studio G8 outshines the ZBook Firefly and challenges the ZBook Fury as the top all-rounder in the company's workstation lineup.

name: hanna khan
comment: The HP Chromebook x360 14a is a value-priced convertible kept from greatness by a dim display, poor speakers, and inconsistent trackpad.

name: michel hossain
comment: HP's premier laptop workstation, the ZBook Fury 15 G8 with DreamColor screen is a gorgeous choice for design pros who can afford it.

name: Jilendhar Singh
comment: The HP Stream 14 might be a good match for students on a very strict budget, but don't expect to use this laptop for anything outside of basic schoolwork or the least demanding of everyday tasks.
